item.title: Metros falling way behind in issuing of property title deeds
item.dc:creator: Khulekani Magubane
item.description:
Administrative problems, together with a failure to root out abuse of the housing allocation system, is tripping up the delivery of title deeds to beneficiaries in the countryâ€™s cities, with one metro failing to hand over any title deeds in two years. Human Settlements Minister Lindiwe Sisulu told MPs in a recent written reply to […]
